arguments.template:
<sky-list
  [data]="items"
  [defaultView]="grid"
  [appliedFilters]="listFilters"
  (appliedFiltersChange)="modalFilters = $event">
  <sky-list-toolbar>
    <sky-list-secondary-actions>
      <sky-list-secondary-action>
        <button type="button">
          Option
        </button>
      </sky-list-secondary-action>
    </sky-list-secondary-actions>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (A - Z)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="false"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (Z - A)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="true"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-filter-button>
      <sky-filter-button
        (filterButtonClick)="openFilterModal()">
      </sky-filter-button>
    </sky-list-filter-button>
    <sky-list-filter-summary
      (summaryItemClick)="openFilterModal()">
    </sky-list-filter-summary>
  </sky-list-toolbar>

  <sky-list-view-grid fit="scroll" #grid>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="name"
      heading="Name">
    </sky-grid-column>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="description"
      heading="Description">
    </sky-grid-column>
  </sky-list-view-grid>
 </sky-list>

<sky-list
  [data]="items"
  [defaultView]="grid"
  [appliedFilters]="listFilters"
  (appliedFiltersChange)="modalFilters = $event">
  <sky-list-toolbar>
    <sky-list-secondary-actions>
      <sky-list-secondary-action>
        <button type="button">
          Option
        </button>
      </sky-list-secondary-action>
    </sky-list-secondary-actions>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (A - Z)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="false"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (Z - A)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="true"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-filter-button>
      <sky-filter-button
        (filterButtonClick)="openFilterModal()">
      </sky-filter-button>
    </sky-list-filter-button>
    <sky-list-filter-summary
      (summaryItemClick)="openFilterModal()">
    </sky-list-filter-summary>
  </sky-list-toolbar>

  <sky-list-view-grid fit="scroll" #grid>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="name"
      heading="Name">
    </sky-grid-column>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="description"
      heading="Description">
    </sky-grid-column>
  </sky-list-view-grid>
 </sky-list>
